title: My league crashes every 3 min after I got the new update.
body: I WANT TO PLAY LEAGUE!! SOMEONE HELP ME FIND A SOLUTION TO THIS. I AM A VERY SAD PANDA, I CAN'T PLAY MY GAME AND IT'S STRESSING ME. HAALPPP

replies.body: I'm here to help but I need more details on your issue.  What is happening exactly?  What do you mean by crashing and what do you see?  Any error messages?  When?  Let me know, these details are super important in order to help.

Hey, thanks for replying. I'm not at home but expect a reply in 1 hour. I've reinstalled league and haven't tried to go in game yet. When the game crashes it's not bug splat. It says like windows error and it forces me to close the program and re open it.
